channel.title: Nobiwa
channel.description:
hello
im also making a server
i will show off some things later with pics
the source i started with is :dragon force v2 so some credits to him
i started 2 hours ago.
i added summoning making npc who give u starter stuff for it and hes explaining it
i made a helm named berzerker charged
when i wear it and opperate it u summon a mith dragon.
it cost a full special bar and can only be used once in the 5 minits setting it to 10 minits
i making a full armour with that sorts of abilitys like the pl8 who raises ur strenght etc.
the stuff will b empty first and u need to charge it in a mini game.
im also making a new train area with npc's and drops.
got a cool name for my server post it ty
i keep this up to date every day
things added:
added dialog to combat instructor he explains summoning

item.title: Nobiwa
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

quote tags might have been a better choice to present this. Good luck on you project though. Anyone that tries for 508 has balls, because if you fail, you fail along with every other 508 creator out there. Just make sure it’s not the same as all the others, K?

item.description:
@nobiwa666 wrote:

u 2[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 24, 2008, 11:26:19 am[/size][hr]adde the interfaces of the summoing thing in the begin fo the quest that object added it now setting items on it and im setting pouches on every1 bank when he/ she logges in[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 24, 2008, 07:30:20 pm[/size][hr]added when u talk to the combat instructor u get 28 pouches i do thiss till they are auto set on bank[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 24, 2008, 08:19:48 pm[/size][hr]added: summoning timer u can now only summon a npc every 5 min
added: bank items u start with some pouches on the bank

bussy with adding: npc’s in the city
